public_key.description: The distributed public key of the drand group

period.description: The time in seconds between randomness beacon rounds

genesis_time.description: The time in seconds since the Unix Epoch that the group began generating randomness

genesis_seed.description: The genesis seed used instead of round 0.

chain_hash.description: The chain hash, which uniquely identifies the drand chain. It is used as a root of trust for validation of the first round of randomness.

scheme.description: The name of the scheme this network uses. The scheme specifies the type of cryptography being used to generate the randomness beacons
